name: MoyaUnbox
summary: Unbox bindings for Moya. Includes RxSwift and ReactiveSwift bindings as well.
description:
[Unbox](https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/Unbox) bindings for
[Moya](https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/Moya) for easier JSON serialization.
Includes [RxSwift](https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/RxSwift) and [ReactiveSwift](https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/ReactiveSwift) bindings as well.
Instructions on how to use it are in
[the README](https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/MoyaUnbox).
